page.title: 01Introduction to this Area
page.content: It is possible to walk almost exactly round the perimeter of our D-Block, with reference 03680861. Leaving{Banff Primary School}and crossing the road in front of the{ {Seafield Hotel}we then go down a grass slope towards{Duff House.}We walk past the playing fields and out along the woodland path towards the{Bridge of {Alvah,}crossing the{River Deveron.} Then we walk through{Montcoffer Wood,} and on for several kilometres towards{ {Dounepark Farm.}Now we are surrounded by farmland. As we continue along the woodland path towards Macduff we pass through{Gellyhill Farm.}We then walk along the main road under the shadow of the{Temple of Venus,}which sits on top of the Hill of Doune. Turning left we cross{Banff Bridge}and walk by the Golf Course. We cross the{High Street} to get back to school.
